question: When did Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose escape from his resident to go Russia?
explanation: S.C. Bose was placed under house arrest by the British in 1940. In the year 1941 (16th January), he escaped from his residence at Kolkata and reached Russia via Afghanistan. This incident is also known as "The Great Escape". His nephew Sisir Kumar Bose helped him during this escape.
